Name: Blaze Torc
LongDescription: Absorbs damage from Water-type moves to restore HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Torchic, Combusken, and Blaziken.  You can get a Blaze Torc at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Blazi-Claw, a Blazi-Card, and a Blazi-Seal. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
